name: Mario Metaverse
description:
Mario Metaverse! - This future
is coming and every pop
culture will adapt. This is how I
imagine the iconic Mario will be
like when he's in the metaverse.
- Artist note: I wanted to be a
game developer when I was
young. Super Mario was my
favorite game ever as a kid!
Things didn’t turn out that way
but I still get to make this kind
of animation for a living.
